channel.title: One question!
channel.description: Okay, so I've made a .jar client and it works fine and I made an auto-cache downloader too. But one question: if I ever update, lets say for example the spirites, will I need to jar the client again or what? I don't understand...

item.title: One question!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Yes you have to re-jar it and upload it again to your website if you have a webclient.

Read full topic
